title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Transients in water conductor systems; design of hydropower installation components - intake structures; water conductor systems tunnels; surge-tanks; penstocks; valves and anchor-blocks; types of powerhouse - underground and semi-underground; turbines and their foundations; introduction to structural and geotechnical aspects of powerhouse design - CAD applications; similitude and models.
